PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-01322022-02-18TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Large Fishing Vessel Inspection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the LARGE FISHING VESSELS INSPECTION REGULATIONS in order to require that water level detectors, connected to an audible and visual alarm in the control station of the vessel, be fitted in all watertight compartments of large fishing vessels below the waterline not intended to carry liquids.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0025 Publication Date: 2022-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
